description: Hoss Kado is a stud on the field, but he's much more interested in scoring with Dalton Riley after the game. Luckily, Dalton is definitely down to kick it with Hoss, who is no stranger to a little rough play. Hoss shows off his ball handling skills and then shows why he's a fullback on the field and in the bedroom, giving Dalton all the ass he can handle and then some, as they play in all of their favorite positions until they both reach their goal. The great thing about this game is that when these two cum together, everyone wins.Enjoy!
title: Cleat & Beat
